body.p: In particular, the Board considered whether to include circumstances where there is a long ageing or maturation process after harvest (for example, for wine production from grapes and cheese production from milk) in the scope of the Standard. Those who believe that the Standard should cover such processing argue that:

li.p: such a long ageing or maturation process is similar to biological transformation and fundamental to assessing the performance of an entity; and
many agricultural entities are vertically integrated and involved in, for example, producing both grapes and wine.
